Class MsgPatternHelper

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.BaseHelper
us.mn.state.dot.tms.MsgPatternHelper
public class MsgPatternHelper extends BaseHelper
Helper class for messages patterns.
Author:
Douglas Lau

      Lookup the message pattern with the specified name

    • find

      public static MsgPattern find(String ms)
      Find a message pattern with the specified MULTI string.
      Parameters:
      ms - MULTI string.
      Returns:
      A matching message pattern or null if no match is found.

    • findAllCompose

      public static Set<MsgPattern> findAllCompose(DMS dms)
      Find all compose message patterns for the specified DMS, sorted

    • better

      public static MsgPattern better(MsgPattern p0, MsgPattern p1)
      Compare two message patterns, preferring those which can be combined with a scheduled message (shared combining).
      Returns:
      "Better" of the provided patterns.

    • findSignConfigs

      public static Set<SignConfig> findSignConfigs(MsgPattern pat)
      Find all sign configs for a message pattern. This includes configs for: - the pattern's compose hashtag - Lane use multi with the pattern - Device action with the pattern - Alert config + message with the pattern

    • lineCount

      public static int lineCount(MsgPattern pat)
      Get the count of lines associated with a message pattern

    • validateLines

      public static String validateLines(MsgPattern pat, DMS dms, String ms)
      Validate text lines for a message pattern.
      Returns:
      Empty string (wrong pattern), validation error message, or null on success.

    • validateWords

      public static String validateWords(MsgPattern pat, DMS dms, String ms)
      Validate text words for a message pattern.
      Returns:
      Empty string (wrong pattern), validation error message, or null on success.

    • lineTextRects

      public static List<TextRect> lineTextRects(MsgPattern pat, DMS dms)
      Make list of text rectangles for each line in a pattern
